Review Text: This anti aging cream arrived quickly and packaged nicely. It uses some very high quality ingredients in order  to produce high quality results. I don't know about long term results yet but so far I really like this cream and I would highly recommend.

reference_summary:
Osmotics Eye Lash Enhancing Serum - Eyelash & Brow Growth Serum for Fuller, Healthier and Bolder Looking Lashes - Advanced Formula Formulated with Biotin and Natural Growth Peptides for Longer, Thicker and Darker Eyelashes - Nourishes, Conditions, Strengthen, Enhance, Moisturize and Lengthen Natural Lash and Brows Osmotics Cosmeceuticals ['EYELASH GROWTH SERUM - A revolutionary enhancing serum that promotes the appearance of fuller, bolder-looking Lashes. Get healthier and fuller-looking lashes with Osmotics Lash Enhancer Serum. This lash-enhancing serum comes infused with biotin and peptides. The formula nourishes and conditions to promote the appearance of healthier, fuller, and more beautiful-looking lashes. Plus, this lash booster leaves lashes feeling moisturized and longer looking in just 4 weeks. The gentle full lash serum is safe to use around the eyes, just apply it 1-2x daily from root to tip of your lashes. With the included, fine-tip brush applicator, the application is quick and simple.'] {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'Osmotics Cosmeceuticals', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '7.83 x 2.17 x 2.05 inches; 0.63 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'O OSMOTICS COSMECEUTICALS'} This eyelash serum is really nice. So far I have no issues with it. I will see how this goes after usage. As far as I can tell this is high quality lash serum and I am very excited to use it. This little tube will go a long way. So far so good SmoothSkin Pure FIT Intelligent Ultrafast IPL Permanent Hair Reduction for Women & Men - Body & Face – FDA Cleared SMOOTHSKIN {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.6 x 2.5 x 7.2 inches; 2.62 Pounds', 'Manufacturer': 'Cyden Limited'} Wow this SmoothSkin Pure FIT Intelligent Ultrafast IPL Laser is impressive! I’ve had and used IPL lasers in the past but literally none of them were this fast.

This thing is so simple and easy to use; read the booklet, follow the instructions, but all you have to do is plug it in and use it. It’s not complicated it’s actually very easy and simple to use.

You do have to start with a shaved clean skin and then all you have to do is press and hold the button and in speed mode it will continuously flash as long as you move it along the skin. I have found that IPL laser results are effective and long lasting as long as you use this right. Go by the skin tone graph and use it weekly, unless skin irritation develops.

I absolutely love this thing. I like the little cap that it comes with for precision treatment areas such as the face. The cap Is actually magnetic so it stays on very well. My only gripe with this is that for this price, and this was priced at $379 at the time of purchase, you should get a case with this product, but you do not get any protective case just a box that it ships in, that’s kind of disappointing to me but it’s not a dealbreaker because this product produces excellent results. I would highly highly highly recommend this IPL laser in particular just because of the speed and effectiveness of it. I have pretty sensitive skin and after use I did not have any irritation with it. I used it on my face, under arms, bikini area and legs. I could not believe how fast it was and how easy it was to use! Impressive U Beauty Preface Kit | Skin Care Gift Value Set with Retinol, Vitamin C Serum Anti-Aging Essentials Skin Tightening Arm Cream + Facial Hyaluronic Acid Morning and Night - 2.7oz (Set of 3) U Beauty ['Our three cult-favorite hero products in an exclusive getaway-ready kit: The essential Travel Trio features the Resurfacing Compound 15ml, SUPER Hydrator 15ml, and SCULPT Arm Compound 50ml.'] {'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Brand': 'U Beauty', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Use for': 'Neck, Face', 'Item Volume': '15 Milliliters', 'Product Dimensions': '6.5 x 4.33 x 7.87 inches; 1.35 Pounds', 'UPC': '850022804137', 'Manufacturer': 'U Beauty', 'Country of Origin': 'Italy'} This amazing skin care set includes a resurfacing compound, a super hydrator and finally a sculpt compound.
This set uses retinol, vitamin C as well as hyaluronic acid to provide skin tightening results for the face, neck and chest areas. This set should last 4 weeks. At $158.00 it seems expensive but I am not sure about long term results yet so I am not sure if it is worth it. Exactly as described Marine Forest Eyebrow Stamp Stencil Kit, 2 Colors in 1 Waterproof and Long Lasting One Step Easy Color Brow Stamp with 24 Eyebrow Stencils Shaping Kit Reusable, 1 Brush and 1 Razor Marine Forest {'Brand': 'Marine Forest', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoothening', 'Product Dimensions': '4.65 x 0.71 x 0.71 inches; 2.08 Ounces'} This eyebrow stamp kit comes with 24 stencils and two colors. The black and brown are pretty dark but exactly as described. I really like this set as it was relatively cheap and you get so much variety with it. I would totally re! Eyebrow stamp kit New Soft Hair Curlers Rollers,Heatless Curling Headband for Sleeping, No Heat Ponytail Hairband Hair Curler,Overnight Lazy Scrunchie Rollers Magic DIY Hair Styling Tools for Long Hair (pink) NexMe {'Number of Items': '1', 'Material': 'Rubber', 'Brand': 'NexMe', 'Color': 'Pink', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '5.91 x 4.53 x 1.57 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '799904670265'} Soft, simple and easy to use hair curler. The pink color is pretty too. This will give you natural bedtime curls with little effort. This gets two thumbs up!

You could also use this as a hairstyle too! Cute and useful! By Terry Hyaluronic Pressed Hydra-Powder | Transcluscent | Infused with Hyaluronic Acid | Vegan By Terry {'Brand': 'By Terry', 'Item Form': 'powder', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '3.19 x 3.15 x 0.75 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'Item model number': '3700076457087'} Exactly as described/pictured. Exactly as described L'ANGE HAIR Detangling Comb Brush | Lightweight, Comfortable, Non-slip Design | Easy Glide, Smooth, Snag-Free Comb | Blush L'ANGE HAIR {'Brand': "L'ANGE HAIR", 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Color': 'Blush', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '11.1 x 3.5 x 0.51 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'Item model number': '2335', 'UPC': '810108190264', 'Manufacturer': "L'ANGE HAIR"} This cute pink comb is perfect for detangling wet hair. I like to use this after the shower, it helps not to pull my fine hair our. But it definitely helps to detangle. This is exactly as described and pictured! Two thumbs up! Sturdy EMILIE HEATHE - Lip Atelier Lip Color | Sustainable, Cruelty-Free, Clean Beauty (Public) {'Finish Type': 'Shimmery, Natural', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Smoothening,Moisturizing,Clean', 'Material Type Free': 'Paraben Free', 'Coverage': 'Buildable', 'Specialty': 'Cruelty-free,Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '7.2 x 2.13 x 1.5 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'UPC': '810033380181'} This is exactly as described and pictured! Two thumbs up! Exactly as described Elli K Essential Sincerity From AZ Time Reverse Double Ampoule – Made in USA - Double Layering Serum – Repairing & Deep Hydrating – Oil and Cream Formula for Healthy and Smooth Skin, (2.02 fl.oz.) ELLI K {'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Anti-aging', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Scent': 'Banana', 'Brand': 'ELLI K', 'Package Dimensions': '5.24 x 1.93 x 1.73 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'UPC': '841960174819'} This face moisturizer is great! I really like the formula - it uses high quality ingredients to produce high quality results. As for long term results, I don’t know yet but so far I really like this and I would high recommend! profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user maintains a keen focus on sustainable and clean beauty products, prioritizing effective solutions that enhance their beauty routine and skin health. They show a continued interest in high-quality beauty tools and hair care accessories.

- **Quality Appreciation:** Their commitment to high-quality, vegan formulations with beneficial ingredients is evident across all beauty categories. They seek products with proven efficacy, reinforcing their dedication to natural products.

- **Experience-Oriented:** The user actively engages with products, providing detailed and thoughtful reviews. Their recent positive experience with an anti-aging cream demonstrates their high standards for product performance and user satisfaction.

- **Safety Concerns:** A cautious approach to sensitive skin and hair types is a hallmark of their shopping behavior, as they actively seek safe and comfortable applications.

- **Scent Sensitivity:** The user has a strong preference for products with pleasant, natural fragrances, which play a significant role in their selection process.

- **Review Engagement:** The user contributes valuable insights to community discussions about beauty and hair products, bolstering collective understanding through their detailed experiences.

Overall, their informed approach is characterized by a careful balance of quality, effectiveness, safety, and a continuous exploration of sustainable options, enhanced by their recent experience with a highly-rated anti-aging moisturizer.
